chapter.title: Running the Example
chapter.para: Follow instructions below to run &THIS.APPLICATION; with &THIS.PLATFORM; USSD gateway:

step.title: Setup &THIS.PLATFORM; USSD gateway
step.para: Follow instructions in &THIS.PLATFORM; USSD gateway documentation to set it properly.
Set up consumer of messages. &THIS.PLATFORM; provides such examples. Please refer to examples list and documentation.

step.title: Start streaming server.
step.para: Put proper IP and port in text field( values should match those set used to setup USSD gateway)
Start streaming server (M3UserAgent) with Open server button.

step.title: Await connection
step.para: Wait until simulators SS7 is connected to remote peer.
